meanings.definition: Capable of being put into practice.
meanings.sent1: The plan showed great practicableness in its simplicity.
meanings.sent2: Her idea for a new game was met with doubt about its practicableness.
meanings.sent3: The cat's practicableness in catching mice made it the hero of the house.
meanings.sent4: His practicableness in fixing things earned him the nickname 'Mr. Fix-It'.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's practicableness in explaining complex topics made learning easy for the students.

meanings.definition: The quality of being feasible or achievable.
meanings.sent1: The practicableness of the project made it a top priority for the team.
meanings.sent2: Without considering the practicableness of the plan, it was doomed to fail.
meanings.sent3: The practicableness of the idea was questioned by many, but it proved successful in the end.
meanings.sent4: The practicableness of her dream to travel the world seemed impossible until she won the lottery.
meanings.sent5: The practicableness of his goal to run a marathon motivated him to train every day.
